darkhistory¶

Main body of the code.

Packages

darkhistory.electrons Electron cooling processes.
darkhistory.history Classes and functions for computing temperature and ionization histories.
darkhistory.low_energy Functions for low-energy deposition and f_c(z).
darkhistory.spec Classes and functions for manipulating spectra.
